resources.string: Its about the amazing and mind bending adventures of Sherlock Holmes and John Watson
The novels chronicle the lives of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
The Lord of the Rings tells of the great quest undertaken by Frodo and the Fellowship of the Ring
Helen Keller\'s triumph over her blindness and deafness has become one of the most inspiring stories of our time
Press for to borrow and for more information
